channel.title: Kingdom - Seasons — TMDB
channel.description: In this zombie thriller set in Korea's medieval Joseon dynasty which has been defeated by corruption and famine, a mysterious rumor of the king’s death spreads, as does a strange plague that renders the infected immune to death and hungry for flesh. The crown prince, fallen victim to a conspiracy, sets out on a journey to unveil the evil scheme and save his people. - Powered by RSSHub

item.title: Season 2
item.description:
User Score: 8.224
Vote Count: 1074

The outbreak leaves no one safe. But the infected are not the only monsters in Prince Chang's way as he fights to protect the kingdom.

item.title: Season 1
item.description:
User Score: 8.224
Vote Count: 1074

While strange rumors about their ill king grip a kingdom, the crown prince becomes their only hope against a mysterious plague overtaking the land.
